keyFacts: Epstein's attorneys are seeking to file his supplemental financial disclosure under seal to prevent public dissemination.
The motion cites the Bail Reform Act (18 U.S.C. ยง 3153(c)(1)) which requires financial information provided for bail determinations to remain confidential.
Epstein's previous bail submission did not include complete financial disclosure on advice of counsel to ensure accuracy.
The motion argues that public filing would lead to widespread media dissemination, contravening statutory confidentiality requirements.
The document reveals Epstein's legal team included Reid Weingarten, Martin G. Weinberg, and Marc Allan Fernich as of July 2019.
